(Simplified: 潍)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 維 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 維 [ wéi ] to preserve, to maintain, to hold together
①(濰河)水名，在中國山東省。
②(濰坊)市名，在中國山東省。
濰坊 [ wéi fāng ]: Weifang prefecture level city in Shandong
濰坊市 [ wéi fāng shì ]: Weifang prefecture level city in Shandong
濰城 [ wéi chéng ]: Weicheng district of Weifang city 潍坊市 , Shandong
濰城區 [ wéi chéng qū ]: Weicheng district of Weifang city 潍坊市 , Shandong
濰坊地區 [ wéi fāng dì qū ]: Weifang prefecture in Shandong

濰字的基本解释

濰
wéi
见“潍”。

濰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wéi］
［《廣韻》以追切，平脂，以。］
“潍1”的繁体字。
(1)水名。今称潍河。在山东省东部。
(2)古州名。又县名。今山东省潍坊市。以产木板年画闻名国内。参阅清顾祖禹《读史方舆纪要·山东七·莱州府》。

濰字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　濰； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页657第16
【唐韻】以追切【集韻】【韻會】夷隹切，?音惟。水名。【書·禹貢】濰湽其道。【前漢·地理志】水出琅邪箕屋山，北至都昌縣，入海。　又縣名。【廣輿記】濰縣，屬萊州府，本漢膠東地，隋北海，唐濰州。

Wei
Basic explanation of words
Wei
wéi
See "Wei".
Wei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wéi］
["Guang Yun" to chase cutting, flat fat, to. ]
Traditional characters for "Wei 1".
(1) Water name. Today it is called Weihe. In the east of Shandong Province.
(2) The name of the ancient state. Also the name of the county. Today Weifang City, Shandong Province. It is well-known domestically for producing wooden plank New Year pictures. Refer to Qing Gu Zuyu's "Minutes of Reading History and Fangyu·Shandong Seven·Laizhou Mansion".
Wei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　Wei; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 657-16
[Tang Yun] To chase [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yi Yu cut,? Sound only. Water name. 【Book·Yugong】Weiqi Road. [Pre-Han Geography] The water flows out of Langxie Jiwu Mountain, north to Duchang County, and into the sea.　Also the county name. [Guang Yu Ji] Weixian, belongs to Laizhou Prefecture, the east of the Han Jiao, Beihai of the Sui Dynasty, and Weizhou of the Tang Dynasty.
